item.title: Weather
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

Man weather is the gayest thing ever!!! it laggs server, you cant see properly, it looks gay and people hate it!!!

delete all that stuff there from your server

On most servers they have a command of ::god that makes you fly

Here the code for the command anyway (if you dont have it)
(if you want it mod or higher status only make the player rights = 0 a 1 admin 2 and only (co)owner 3

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“god”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
setAnimation(1500);
playerSE = 1501;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
playerEnergy = 99999999;
sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149);
sendMessage(“God mode on, walk one step to keep active”);
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“godoff”) && playerRights >= 0){
sendMessage(“god mode off”);
playerSE = 0x328;
playerSEW = 0x333;
playerSER = 0x338;
playerSEA = 0x326;
playerEnergy = 100;
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149);
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
[/code]

This is on my server its ::god2 command ( you can change the player status require too)

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god2")) && playerRights >= 0) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 2239; playerSEW = 2239; playerSER = 2239; playerSEA = 2239; sendMessage("Now walk one step, and then come in for the kill."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
and if you dont know how to change player status
Open
Characters folder > (username).txt > Open

Then it will say “Player rights = 0” in there somewhere

Mod = 1
Admin = 2
(co)Owner = 3

Read full topic

item.title: Weather
item.dc:creator: @Agent Agent
item.description:
@Agent wrote:

I see allot of servers with weather.

And i see my source has:

[code] else if (command.startsWith(“theme”)){
String view = command.substring(3);

		if (view.equalsIgnoreCase("Snow")){
			IsSnowing = 1;
		} 
		if (view.equalsIgnoreCase("Stop")){
			IsSnowing = 3;		
		} 
		if (view.equalsIgnoreCase("Dizzy")){
			IsSnowing = 4;
		}
		if (view.equalsIgnoreCase("SandStorm")){
			IsSnowing = 5;
		}
		if (view.equalsIgnoreCase("Afternoon")){
			IsSnowing = 6;
		}
		if (view.equalsIgnoreCase("Evening")){
			IsSnowing = 7;
		}
		if (view.equalsIgnoreCase("Night")){
			IsSnowing = 8;
		}[/code]

Does this mean i can make weather? And if so how?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2007, 12:33:06 AM[/size][hr]2nd:

I am Ownagedscape based.

Is there a code for weather?

I also want to fly.

Read full topic
